attributes.action: Stop nurses having to pay their £120 subscriptions/monthly fees
attributes.additional_details: This pandemic has been hard on everyone but nurses and doctors have become our heroes during all this... saving lives..... give the nurses a break and show them how important they are.
attributes.background: I think it’s dreadful that Nurses, who aren’t paid very much have to pay £120 a year subscription and just over £14 a month when they are saving lives every day and working so hard especially during this pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555025

The professional fees for nurses are set by the professional bodies for nurses, not the Government or House of Commons, but the above petition calls on the Government to reimburse nurses for the cost of these fees.
